abilities.name: Sunder
about: Slams the ground, creating a wave of broken ground that damages enemies in an area in front of player

abilities.name: Quake Slam
about: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration.

abilities.name: Leap Slam
about: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way

abilities.name: Flicker Strike
about: Teleports the character to a nearby monster and attacks with a melee weapon

abilities.name: Spectral Throw
about: Throws a spectral copy of encounter's melee weapon. It flies out and then returns to the encounter, in a spinning attack that damages enemies in its path

abilities.name: Shield Charge
about: Charges at a targeted location based on player location, pushing away enemies in encounter's path and repeatedly dealing damage in a small area in front of encounter. The further encounter travels, the more damage encounter deals.
